Constituent.Name: Nitrogen
Constituent.Description: 2002 Total Nitrogen Model for the southeastern U.S. (MRB2)

Source.Name: Wet dep. of inorg. nitrogen
Source.Description: Wet deposition of inorganic nitrogen (ammonia and nitrate) 2002, from K. Savvas, USGS, 2006

Source.Name: Fert. applied to agric. land
Source.Description: Nitrogen fertilizer on farmland 2002, kg - NLCD01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008

Source.Name: Livestock manure
Source.Description: Nitrogen in livestock waste 2002 Ag Census, NLCD01 - based spatial distribution, Terziotti 10-2008

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Wastewater discharge Nitrogen load from point source dischargers in 2002, kg, Terziotti, 10-200. Reported in kg. Wet dep. of inorg. nitrogen Wet deposition of inorganic nitrogen (ammonia and nitrate), kg, detrended to 2002, K. Savvas, USGS, 2006. Reported in kg. Imp. surf. area Impervious surface area, square kilometers, National Land Cover Dataset 01 based, Terziotti 12-2008. Reported in sqkm. Fert. applied to agric. land Nitrogen fertilizer on farmland 2002, kg - National Land Cover Dataset 01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008. Reported in kg. Livestock manure Nitrogen in livestock waste 2002, kg - National Land Cover Dataset 01 - area-based method Terziotti 10-2008. Reported in kg.
